definitions.definition: The act or process of expanding.
definitions.example: The expansion of metals and plastics in response to heat is well understood.

definitions.definition: The fractional change in unit length per unit length per unit temperature change.

definitions.example: My new office is in the expansion behind the main building.

definitions.definition: A product to be used with a previous product.
definitions.example: This expansion requires the original game board.

definitions.definition: That which is expanded; expanse; extended surface.
(steam engines) The operation of steam in a cylinder after its communication with the boiler has been cut off, by which it continues to exert pressure upon the moving piston.
